predicate.note: Frames file for 'wall off' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: usually without arg2?
example.text: But even before Wang's latest financial troubles surfaced, some customers ``were trying [*-2] to wall off their Wang installations'' so other departments wouldn't add Wang, says Chris Christiansen, a former Wang marketer who is now a market analyst with Meta Group, a market research firm in Stamford, Conn.
example.arg: so other departments wouldn't add Wang

example.name: passive with arg2
example.text: John's bedroom is walled off *trace* from the rest of the house.
